'bi'kong'yong'jiang'ti'shou 鼻孔慵将涕收
'bi'kou'bu'dao'zhong'xin 彼口不道忠信

'bie'lai'kong'xiang'si 别来空相思

'bu'kan'shi'shi'shang'chou'mei 不堪世事上愁眉
'bu'kan'shu'yu'di'ba'jiao 不堪疏雨滴芭蕉
'bu'kan'shu'yu'zai'ba'jiao 不堪疏雨在芭蕉
'bu'kan'xie'yu'da'xu'chuang 不堪斜雨打虚窗
'bu'kan'you'meng'po'chen'ji 不堪幽梦破晨鸡
'bu'kan'yu'da'geng'feng'chui 不堪雨打更风吹
'bu'kan'yu'jun'cheng'yi'zui 不堪与君成一醉
'bu'ke'de'er'bian 不可得而辨
'bu'ke'kui'han'meng 逋客愧寒盟
'bu'ke'mei'shu 不可枚数
'bu'ke'xi'ji 不可悉记
'bu'ke'xing'rong 不可形容
'bu'ken'bi'ren'dang'dao'sun 不肯避人当道笋
'bu'ken'jiu'piao'ling 不肯就飘零
'bu'ken'qin'geng'nou 不肯勤耕耨
'bu'ken'shi'ke'ju 不肯事科举
'bu'ken'shou'pan'wan 不肯受盘绾
'bu'ken'xiong'shi'qian 不肯兄事钱
'bu'kou'fu'er'men 不叩富儿门
'bu'kui'jun'wang'zuo'ci'cha 不愧君王坐赐茶
'bu'kui'zai'yu'fu 不愧载与覆
'bu'lai'san'shi'zai 不来三十载
'bu'lai'xiang'song'chu 不来相送处
'bu'lan'xin'ji'na'dei'zhi 不览新集那得知
'bu'le'fu'he'yun 不乐复何云
'bu'li'fan'qiang'tian'guang'da 不立樊墙天广大
'bu'li'wen'zi'hua'zu'yi 不离文字话祖意
'bu'li'xian'ren'zhai 不立仙人宅
'bu'liang'wu'li'geng'chou'bian 不量吾力更筹边
'bu'liao'guan'yuan'cang'yu'shu 不料官园苍玉束
'bu'liao'gui'geng'ye'wu'shen 不料归耕也误身
'bu'liao'san'nian'hou 不料三年后
'bu'ling'ren'jian'xin 不令人艰辛
'bu'ling'tuo'lai'ru'yi'meng 簿领脱来如一梦
'bu'ling'xing'shi'luo'ren'jian 不令姓氏落人间
'bu'liu'san'ju'wu'ju'shi 不留三句五句诗
'bu'liu'wo'yi'cun 不留我亦存
'bu'lun'mao'wu'chu'li'wai 不论茅屋锄犁外
'bu'lun'rong'ru'yu'ci'ji 不论荣辱与刺讥
'bu'lun'shan'bei'yu'shan'nan 不论山北与山南
'bu'lun'zao'wan'dai'qing'kai 不论早晚待晴开
'bu'man'yi'xiao'kui 不满一笑喟
'bu'mei 不寐
'bu'mei'he'wei'zhe 不寐何为者
'bu'mei'rao'shi'si 不寐饶诗思
'bu'mei'ting'yu 不寐听雨
'bu'meng'jin'diao'shi'yu'hua 不梦金貂侍玉华
'bu'mi'jia'zhi'gui'jian 卜米价之贵贱
'bu'mian'ou'ai'bu'qu'zhi 不眠偶爱不渠知
'bu'mian'wei'wang'zhi'chuang'ming 不眠惟望纸窗明
'bu'ming'sui'shun'zhi 不名随顺智
'bu'mu'li'ba'bai 不慕李八百
'bu'na'wang'mo'jie 布衲王摩诘
'bu'nai'chang'an'xiao'che'de 不奈长安小车得
'bu'nai'ci'xiang'shu'wu'mei 不奈此香殊妩媚
'bu'nai'di'yan'sheng 不奈滴檐声
'bu'nai'er'tong'niao'que'sao 不奈儿童鸟雀搔
'bu'nai'lin'feng'xue'chan'ban 不奈邻峰学禅伴
'bu'nai'lou'tou'ye'yu'sheng 不奈楼头夜雨声
'bu'nai'shi'xiang'wei 不奈世相违
'bu'nai'xian'ren'bei'yang'he 不奈闲人背痒何
'bu'nan'shi'li'qin 不难十里勤
'bu'neng'chang'ming'si 不能长鸣嘶
'bu'neng'cheng'fo'bu'neng 不能成佛不能
'bu'neng'dai'zhao'jin'luan'dian 不能待诏金銮殿
'bu'neng'lai'wang'cheng'zhong'si 不能来往城中寺
'bu'neng'lao'qiao'song 不能老乔松
'bu'neng'shao'fu'fu 不能少负辐
'bu'neng'sui'bo'su 不能随薄俗
'bu'neng'wei'lu'lian 不能为鲁连
'bu'neng'wei'zi'mou 不能为子谋
'bu'neng'yu'yu'ku'zhong'cang 不能郁郁窟中藏
'bu'neng'yue'ju'luan'zhi'jian'er 不能越拘挛之见耳
'bu'neng'zhi'wo'yu'tang'zhong 不能置我玉堂中
'bu'ni'fen'qi'pin 不拟分奇品
'bu'ni'jin'nian'dao'she'zhou 不拟今年到歙州
'bu'ni'zhe'xing'da 不溺者幸大
'bu'nian'guan'shan'qi'lu'chang 不念关山歧路长
'bu'nian'zui'gui'xiang'jing'yue 步辇醉归香迳月
'bu'ning'yuan'bing'bi 不佞愿秉笔
'bu'nong'bu'sang'ba'shu'ce 不农不桑把书册
'bu'pa'chun'han'de'de'lai 不怕春寒得得来
'bu'pa'huang'lin'shi'li'bei 不怕荒林十里陂
'bu'pa'man'yan'shuang 不怕满檐霜
'bu'pa'ren'cheng'mi'xue'liu 不怕人称米薛刘
'bu'pa'yu'yun'mai'yue'zhi 不怕雨云埋嶽趾
'bu'qi'si'ren'shu'yu'you 不起斯人孰与游
'bu'qian'bu'wo'xia 卜迁不我遐
'bu'qing'ru'shi 不情如世
'bu'qiong'shi'rao'zi'mei'tai 步筇时绕紫莓苔
'bu'qiu'suo'shi'xi'zhi'jiang'he'qiu 不求所事兮志将何求
'bu'qu'di'tou'bai'jiu'guan 部曲低头拜旧官
'bu'qu'long'tian'shi'yao'yu 不去龙田拾瑶玉
'bu'qu'ying'ye'chui 部曲营夜炊
'bu'quan'zi'jia'can 不劝自加餐
'bu'ran 不然
'bu'ran'bi'duan'ying'you'kou 不然笔端应有口
'bu'ran'he'ji'jian'chun'feng 不然何计见春风
'bu'ran'jie'shi'xing'er'mian 不然借使幸而免
'bu'ran'kong'ru'wei'shi'bei 不然恐汝为时辈
'bu'ran'qin'jiao'shu 不然亲交书
'bu'ran'shou'bai'yi'he'fang 不然受拜亦何妨
'bu'ran'tu'shou'bu'xu'xiu 不然徒寿不须休
'bu'ran'wu'cun'zha 不然无寸札
'bu'ran'wu'nai'zhen'mi'tian 不然无乃真弥天
'bu'ran'xue'sun'wu 不然学孙吴
'bu'ran'yun'mu'yu'zi'ying 不然云母与紫英
'bu're'mei'hua'hen 不惹梅花恨
'bu'ren'du'jia'shu 不忍读家书
'bu'ren'fu'zi'liao'yun'yun 不忍负子聊云云
'bu'ren'geng'zhong'kan 不忍更重看
'bu'rong'qing'gai'lun'shi'shi 不容倾盖论时事
'bu'ru'bao'chi'fan 不如饱吃饭
'bu'ru'bo'jiu'you'you'qing 不如鹁鸠犹有情
'bu'ru'cai'qiao'tong'lu'gui 不如采樵同路归
'bu'ru'ci'shui'mei 不如此水美
'bu'ru'fu'bei'jiu 不如付杯酒
'bu'ru'fu'ji'ying 不如附骥蝇
'bu'ru'gui'gu'lu 不如归故庐
'bu'ru'gui'wu'lu 不如归吾庐
'bu'ru'hai'shui'tong'tian'he 不如海水通天河
'bu'ru'he'xun'zai'yang'zhou 不如何逊在扬州
'bu'ru'heng'shan 步入衡山
'bu'ru'lao'nong'yan 不如老农谚
'bu'ru'liang'wang'kuai 不如两忘快
'bu'ru'lin'xia'zi 不如林下缁
'bu'ru'lu'lu'wu'zhi'yin 不如碌碌无知音
'bu'ru'ming'zhu'cui'wang'zhong 步入明珠翠网中
'bu'ru'qiang'jiao'qiu'yin'fang'chang'o 不如墙角蚯蚓方长哦
'bu'ru'qie'ting'ti'hu'lu 不如且听提葫芦
'bu'ru'qing'song'san'shi'li 步入青松三十里
'bu'ru'qing'xiao'kan'xin'zhuang 不如清晓看新妆
'bu'ru'ting'zhong'ren 不如亭中人
'bu'ru'tong'shi'qie'sui'yuan 不如同世且随缘
'bu'ru'wu'sheng'xi'shu'ji'wu'you 不如无生兮庶几无尤
'bu'ru'xi'feng'shou'que'yu'ji'xiu 不如西风收却雨即休
'bu'ru'xi'wo'qu 不如息我躯
'bu'ru'xia'nong'bao 不如峡农饱
'bu'ru'xue'fu'qi 不如学服气
'bu'ru'xun'wo'jiu'you'chu 不如寻我旧游处
'bu'ru'yi'cun'hun 不如一寸浑
'bu'ru'zi'jian'zhen 不如自见真
'bu'shan'dian'dao'suo'suo'wu 布衫颠倒傞傞舞
'bu'shang'chan'tou'san'bai'wan 不赏缠头三百万
'bu'shang'ling'yan'ji'hu'qiu 不上灵岩即虎丘
'bu'shang'yan'ling'qi'li'tan 不上严陵七里滩
'bu'shao'dan 不烧丹
'bu'sheng'gu'zhou'wu'lv'bo 不胜孤舟兀绿波
'bu'sheng'huan'shi'jing'he'yu 不省欢时竟何语
'bu'sheng'huan'xi'bai'jia'hui 不胜欢喜拜嘉惠
'bu'sheng'jiu'xing'wei'wu'qian 不生酒兴为无钱
'bu'sheng'tai'lao'gong 不胜太牢公
'bu'shi'bai'tou'xin 不是白头新
'bu'shi'bang'ren'ju'yu'shui 不是傍人俱欲睡
'bu'shi'chong'guan'song'xing'ke 不是冲关送行客
'bu'shi'chou'zhong'ji'bing'zhong 不是愁中即病中

'bu'shi'du'zhong'nian 不食度终年
'bu'shi'gao'ge'ji'han'yin 不是高歌即酣饮
'bu'shi'guan'zhong'cui'shui'ji 不是官中催税急
'bu'shi'jia'ren'chang 不使佳人唱
'bu'shi'jian'e'mei 不使见蛾眉
'bu'shi'jiang'shan'jing'bu'rao 不是江山景不饶
'bu'shi'jin'nian'tian'bu'shu 不是今年天不暑
'bu'shi'jin'zhao'xue'bu'qing 不是今朝雪不清

'bu'shi'kong'fei'qu 不施恐飞去
'bu'shi'kui'zhou'du'shao'ling 不是夔州杜少陵
'bu'shi'lao'seng'kong'ao'shi 不是老僧空傲世
'bu'shi'mian'jie'ti 布石绵阶梯
'bu'shi'qian'yan'xi 不是前言戏
'bu'shi'qiao'peng'shi'chuan'dao 不使敲抨使传道
'bu'shi'qiao'weng'ji'diao'weng 不是樵翁即钓翁
'bu'shi'qing'lou'xiu'bo'xing 不是青楼羞薄幸
'bu'shi'quan'wu'zui'jia'chu 不是全无最佳处
'bu'shi'ren'jian'you'yong'shi 不是人间有用诗
'bu'shi'ren'yi'qiang 不使人意强

'bu'shi'tao'hua'shi'lv'yin 不是桃花是绿阴
'bu'shi'wei'jian'nan 不是为艰难
'bu'shi'wu'cao'wei'bi'qi 不是吾曹未必奇

'bu'shi'xiao'shu'tian'lu'ge 不使校书天禄阁
'bu'shi'xing'ren'ye'duan'chang 不是行人也断肠
'bu'shi'xun'hua'luan'ru'chuan 不使寻花乱入船
'bu'shi'yi'zhi'wei 不食亦知味
'bu'shi'yu'qiao'bu'yu'kai 不是渔樵不与开
'bu'shi'zhang'guan'mian 不识长官面
'bu'shi'zou'yu'bi'sheng'cao 不识驺虞避生草

'bu'shou'shu'guang'qin 不受暑光侵

'bu'shou'wei'wen'tie 不收慰问帖

'bu'shou'zhe'jian'hu 不受折简呼
'bu'shou'zhu'ji'luo 不受珠玑络
'bu'shu'bu'mi'sui'yi'le 不疏不密随宜了
'bu'shu'cai'le'wan'ya'cui 簿书才了晚衙催
'bu'shu'dui'li'fu'qiu'yang 簿书堆里赋秋阳
'bu'shu'hai'di'bai'ren'tou 簿书海底白人头

'bu'shu'mu'yu'bi 不数姆与婢

'bu'shu'ying'ying'ji'shi'le 簿书营营几时了
'bu'shu'zi'ji'mi 簿书自羁縻
'bu'shui 不睡
'bu'si'chou'hun'si'san'fei 不似愁魂四散飞

'bu'wei'qi'ren'nai'ru'xu 不谓其人乃如许

'bu'wei'qiong'gu'ji 不畏穷谷饥

'bu'wei'zi'san'ren 不惟子三人
'bu'wen'bu'wu'huo'li'yun 不文不武火力匀
'bu'wen'chen'deng'shang'xia'chuang 不问陈登上下床

'bu'xi'cai'bu'cai 不系才不才

'bu'xu'ci'chu'you'sheng'ge 不须此处有笙歌
'bu'xu'er'qi'zhuan'fu'mei 不许儿奇专妇美
'bu'xu'geng'dai'xu'fei'shi 不须更待絮飞时

'bu'xu'geng'shuo'sang'yu'nuan 不须更说桑榆暖

'bu'xu'gui'ning'jin 不许归宁觐

'bu'xu'hai'ruo'you'ran 不须海若犹然
'bu'xu'jiao'fu'du'he'xing 不须徼福渡河星
'bu'xu'jiu'shi'tan'ru'meng 不须旧事谈如梦
'bu'xu'kan'wo'zhi'kan'jun 不须看我只看君
'bu'xu'ku'wen'chun'duo'shao 不须苦问春多少
'bu'xu'liu'de'wei'jin'shu 不须刘德伪金书
'bu'xu'qi'jian'zhu'juan'weng 不许其间著倦翁
'bu'xu'shi'huang'quan 不须使黄犬
'bu'xu'wei'dao'chi'dao'qiang 不须为盗持刀枪
'bu'xu'xi'bie'zuo'suan'ran 不须惜别作酸然
'bu'xu'xing'nian'ji 不须行年记
'bu'xu'xiu'ri'shi'tou'xian 不须休日始偷闲

'hui'shou'wang'bei'gu 回首望北固
'hui'shou'wang'yao'yun 回首望尧云

'hui'shou'yuan'long'bai'chi'lou 回首元龙百尺楼
'hui'shu'ceng'bu'lao 挥署曾不劳

'hui'xin 会心

'la'qian'yu'xue'jing'wei'xue 腊前欲雪竟未雪

'la'xue'sui'feng'xia 腊雪随风下

'shi'zhong'yi'duan'xian'gong'shi 诗中一段闲公事
'shi'zhong'you'xin'yu 诗中有新语

'zhe'bei'ju'pi'mi 折北俱披靡
'zhe'bing'ci'mang'zai 折柄刺芒在
'zhe'chong'yu'zuo'lei'fen'di 蛰虫欲作雷奋地
'zhe'chui'zhi'qian'li 折箠制千里
'zhe'ci'dong'tian'gu 着此洞天古
'zhe'ci'ying'tu'wu 着此影突兀
'zhe'de'lin'jia'ju 折得邻家菊
'zhe'dong'zhou'zhong 浙东舟中
'zhe'gong'jin 着宫锦
'zhe'hua'qian'ren'cha 折花倩人插
'zhe'huang'luo'pa'fu'jin'xiang 赭黄罗帕覆金箱
'zhe'ji'xun'shi'dao'liu'yin 着屐寻诗到柳阴
'zhe'jian'gu'ren'lai'bu'lai 折简故人来不来
'zhe'jian'huan'qing'shan 折简唤青山
'zhe'jiang'xiao'ji'chun'ri 浙江小矶春日
'zhe'jiao'dang'chui'fu'ke'hong 折脚铛炊腐颗红
'zhe'jiao'dang'xun'wen'chu'an 折脚铛寻稳处安
'zhe'jie'can'ling'chu 浙界残零处

'zhe'jin'gong'fu'shi'hua'gong 着尽工夫是化工
'zhe'lei'zhuan'kong'chang 蛰雷转空肠
'zhe'liu'dang'ma'bian 折柳当马鞭
'zhe'liu'gu'qing'duo'wang'duan 折柳故情多望断
'zhe'liu'ting'qian'song'gu'ren 折柳亭前送故人
'zhe'luo'fu'zuo 谪罗浮作
'zhe'lv'du'qiao'qiao'zhu'xin 着履渡桥桥柱新

'zhe'ru'deng'qian'xi'nian'kan 折入灯前细捻看
'zhe'shi 蛰室
'zhe'shu'yi'jue 辄书一绝
'zhe'shuang'zhi'hao'dian'qing'mei 蔗霜只好点青梅

'zhe'shui'yi'jia'ban'ru'huai 浙水移家半入淮

'zhe'wei'zhi'lu'yu 辄谓之虏语
